about_the_game:
Fill your MV games with more heroes with the help of Another World Hero Generator for MV! Gee-kun-soft is at it again with another set of generator parts remade to fit MV’s style and layout. With 40 male generator parts to choose from, replace your game’s default Harold with a powerful Harry the Demon Barbarian or Hal the Royal Alchemist!

Choose from 5 Front and Rear Hair options to give your hero a proper hairstyle. Let your carefree adventurer wear his hair wild and in his face while your scholarly mage keeps his brushed back behind his ears, or give your barbarian luscious long locks that he carefully conditions every night to keep it looking good in the middle of combat! 5 Eyes can also help get your heroes’ personalities across in the menu, with eyes fitting a kind but naive young man or dull wide eyes that belong to someone who has stayed up far too long or has forgotten what being a hero truly means.

20 Clothing options along with 2 AccA, 1 AccB, and 2 Beast Ears are ready to help your heroes dress for success! Give a modern teen some gloves that match his school uniform when he needs to fight off bullies and have him wear decorative armor when he cosplays with his friends, or equip your fantasy hero with a small crown and long robes to show that he’s both a mage and a prince. If you were jealous of the previous MZ male hero pack and want your MV heroes to get an upgrade, then make sure to pick up this Another World Hero Generator for MV pack!

Features:

* Clothes ("fantasy" style) = 20
* 3 x Accessories, 2 x Beast Ears (horns)
* Eyes = 5 sets
* Front Hair = 5 Male
* Rear Hair = 5 Male

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
